I'm not sure if I should ignore this error, but I see 67,000 of them in a r=
ecent crawl.  A search for "Unable to promote prerequisite" does not find a=
nything other than source code:

2009-09-26 18:57:19.058 SEVERE thread-27 o=
rg.archive.crawler.postprocessor.LinksScoper.handlePrerequisite() Unable to=
 promote prerequisite dns:www.mit.edu above http://www.mit.edu:8001/robots.=
txt

This error happens *after* some pages for the site have been saved, us=
ually occurs 3 times in different TOE threads, after that I do not see any =
activity on that host/domain.


Paul
